title: PB Alliances List - As of 2nd Dec, 2019
file_name: PB Alliances List - As of 2nd Dec, 2019.pdf
author: HBL Content
summary: The PB Alliances List consists of various dining establishments and lifestyle brands across major cities in Pakistan, including Karachi, Lahore, and Islamabad. The list highlights discounts and offers available to cardholders, aiming to provide a diverse range of options for dining, shopping, and lifestyle services. highlights various merchants included in the list, offering discounts ranging from 10% to 50% on different products and services. Many discounts have specific exclusions, such as items not eligible for discounts or conditions where discounts do not apply, like on sale items. Discounts are often time-limited, with many offers expiring in early 2020. The list features a wide range of businesses, including restaurants, cafes, spas, salons, and retail outlets. emphasizes additional merchants, focusing on dining and lifestyle categories with varied discount percentages. Discounts are generally between 10% and 30%, often varying by card type, such as Titanium or Gold. Many entries specify conditions such as applicability only on selected items, time restrictions, or exclusions from certain promotions. Key entries include Liberty Books, M Jafferjees, Pizza Hut, Nueplex, and Sacha's Cakes, each offering distinct discount percentages and terms. Notable entries across both parts include Liberty Books, which offers 15% and 20% discounts for cardholders; M Jafferjees, providing 10% to 20% discounts on various items; and Pizza Hut, with discounts applicable on specific deals and promotions. Nueplex offers 10% off movie tickets and complimentary valet services, while Sacha's Cakes provides regular 15% to 20% discounts on dining and products. The PB Alliances List provides valuable information on discounts and offers available to cardholders at various merchants in Pakistan. The list is a useful resource for consumers seeking to maximize savings while dining and shopping, with a wide array of options across different categories and cities.
